days, maybe even weeks have passed since phobias arrival on this 
planet, so far his tales of who he is and what brought him here were 
holding up, but it was only a matter of time until his associates 
realised he was repairing an undamaged ship. It was time to learn 
more.Phobia clumsily wanders around the base and finds himself 
outside a sealed door. the sounds of equipment hummed inside, the 
lights seemed to dim slightly as whatever was happening insied 
continued. Phobia pressed the pannel nearest the door to comunicate 
with the inside. even if he couldn't get inside at least he could get 
a video picture of part of the inside. 
"computer route all octographics to my ship and record." 
(Octographics- A spider has eight eyes so does Phobia)



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Dachande85@a... wrote:
> ::Magmatron::
> 
>     He growled at Cheetor, there was one thing he forgot. He 
reached over to 
> a computer consol and pressed a button to activate the programming. 
He waited 
> for it to take affect.
>     
> 
> (The camera and Autogun system are watching Phobia)
